Read More                Questions?   Contact:                                       Your "one-stop shop" for HR and Payroll inquiries and services.   PeopleLink is NYU's integrated service center, providing a single point of contact for your HR and Payroll inquiries and services. Contact PeopleLink at askpeoplelink@nyu.edu or 212-992-LINK (5465) Monday - Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.                                                    NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University.
